mapper.insert: insert into chance (id, chancefrom, cusname, successpro, outline, contacts, phone, description, founder, creattime, assigned, assignedtime, assignedid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chancefrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{successpro,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{founder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creattime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{assigned,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assignedtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{assignedid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update chance set chancefrom = #{chancefrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cusname = #{cusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, successpro = #{successpro,jdbcType=INTEGER}, outline = #{outline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, founder = #{founder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creattime = #{creattime,jdbcType=DATE}, assigned = #{assigned,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assignedtime = #{assignedtime,jdbcType=DATE}, assignedid = #{assignedid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, chancefrom, cusname, successpro, outline, contacts, phone, description, founder, creattime, assigned, assignedtime, assignedid from chance where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
